short_summary: Generater prueba de RF and Microwave
full_summary:
=====================================================

### RF and Microwave Signal Generator Tender

**Tender Information**
--------------------

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3799301237
* **Publication Date**: December 22, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 25, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
* **Amendment Date**: January 9, 2023

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Supply and Service Information**
--------------------------------

* **Goods/Services**: Low Jitter 6 GHz RF and Microwave Signal Generator
* **Description**: [Supplier to Provide]
* **Quantity**: [Supplier to Provide]
* **Delivery**: [Supplier to Provide]
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia, Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

* **Technical Merit**: Suppliers will be evaluated based on their technical capabilities to provide a low jitter 6 GHz RF and Microwave signal generator.
* **Price**: Suppliers will be evaluated based on the price of their proposed signal generator.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contact Name**: Samantha Phelan, PSPC
* **Contact Email**: samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: N/A
* **Contact Fax**: N/A

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

* **Tender Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14961940?extsite=MTQ5NjE5NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Attachments**: None
* **Note**: This tender has expired on January 25, 2023. Respond to [Contact Information] to inquire about future opportunities.

Note: Modifications from the original contractor include;
* removing time fragmentation and technical terms.
* Consolidating versions of phrases, ensuring to mirror English and French text.
* above information follows a logically organised scheme for research and organisation. 
* important details discussed unvarnished and are the same as the originals.  
* omission of extraneous keywords like **referenceNumber-numeroReference**, **statusAppelOffres**
* omitting fields with same repeated responses eg "None"
* adjusting sentence
